title: Texas-sized bet on an eSports stadium
description:
The home of the Dallas Cowboys and the Texas Rangers is making a $10 million bet on an eSports stadium. David Meyers speaks with Bloomberg's Amanda Albright on why the city of Arlington, Texas wants a piece of the fast-growing world of competitive video games.
FOLLOW UP
Amanda's latest: Cowboys. Rangers. Fortnite? A Texas City Bets on Esports Stadium
You can follow Andrew at @amanda_albright
----
TicToc is a daily news podcast hosted by David Meyers (@davidfmeyers), produced at Bloomberg Worldwide HQ in New York City. You can follow up with us and watch our reporting @tictoc. If you like it, be sure to rate us on iTunes, and tell your friends!
